data.title: Calling all fudge afficionados
data.text: Several years I lived here and no good fudge in middle Tennessee. I don't know about in Nashville but 45 minutes is too far to drive for me and I hate highways. Cracker Barrel fudge didn't cut it, i was used to sublime fudge up North. OMG their chocolate peanut butter fudge in a cupcake wrapper is really good. I hope they will keep this in stock and get more fudge and be the only fudge specialty shop in the area. But they got to let people know they have it, as I gave up going there because they never had fudge for years. I'm spreading the word so others know of this great fudge! Hope it always be fresh!

data.title: GREAT GIFTS!!
data.text: I have several times purchased gift baskets filled with great items from the Country Gourmet.  They have a lot of yummy items.  I always bring home some Balsamic Vinegar for myself as well!  The have chocolates, and local Murfreesboro gifts.  I always end up splurging on goodies!!!

data.title: Lovely chocolate's!
data.text:
Here you will fine lovely chocolate's. My personal favorite are the chocolate dipped strawberries, yum! 
The owners here are wonderful, friendly people right ready to help you with gifts of all kinds. Let them make
your favorite person a beautiful gift basket. I have used them many times and was very pleased and was also
pleasantly surprised and very happy as a receiver .

data.title: The PERFECT place for that special gift (or chocolate)
data.text: Plenty of unique gift opportunities at the Country Gourmet. Large selection of Tennessee and Murfreesboro oriented souvenirs and keepsakes. Wonderful selection of chocolates. Something different every time I visit! The Country Gourmet has helpful sales people.
